abilities.description: Luffy stretches his leg high into the air and brings it down like a battle axe with tremendous force, capable of smashing opponents through multiple floors.

keyMoment.context: Used as the finishing move to defeat Arlong, sending him crashing through five floors of Arlong Park.

weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (inability to swim, weakness to sea water and Seastone)
Vulnerable to cutting and piercing attacks
description: The Gomu Gomu no Mi grants the user a rubber body. In this episode, Luffy debuts a new technique - Gomu Gomu no Ono (Battle Axe) - which becomes one of his signature finishing moves.
